algorithm: The new algorithm calculates the score for each bin based on the ratio of the remaining capacity of the bin to the sum of the remaining capacity of all bins plus the squared sum of the capacities of the current item and all the other items already assigned to the bin, and returns the scores as a Numpy array.
code:
import numpy as np

def score(item, bins):
    remaining_capacity = np.sum(bins) - bins + item
    squared_sum = np.sum((bins + item) ** 2)
    scores = remaining_capacity / (np.sum(remaining_capacity) + squared_sum)
    return scores
